descriptor.name: NSAP Pension & Assistance Specialist
descriptor.short_desc: Training on various NSAP schemes, including old age pensions, widow pensions, and disability assistance.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module covers the five sub-schemes of the National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP). Agents will learn to identify eligible beneficiaries for Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS), Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS), Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS), and other related benefits.

list.value: Elderly, widows, persons with disabilities from BPL households
